00040 void Camera::Update(float dt)
00041 {
00042         effect_sum.Set(0, 0);
00043         float precalc = (float)rumble / (float)RAND_MAX;
00044         effect_sum += Vector(rand() * precalc, rand() * precalc);
00045         apply = viewport_size/2 - position + effect_sum;
00046 }
